name: Location
description: Provides methods to get and set the location of a meeting in an Outlook add-in.

methods.name: getAsync
methods.description: Gets the location of an appointment.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: An object literal that contains one or more of the following properties. For more information on defining and using the `options` parameter, see {@tutorial options}.

parameters.name: options.asyncContext
parameters.description: Developers can provide any object they wish to access in the callback method.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The location of the appointment is provided as a string in the `asyncResult.value` property.

methods.name: setAsync
methods.description: Sets the location of an appointment.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location of the appointment. The string is limited to 255 characters.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: An object literal that contains one or more of the following properties. For more information on defining and using the `options` parameter, see {@tutorial options}.

parameters.name: options.asyncContext
parameters.description: Developers can provide any object they wish to access in the callback method.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: If setting the location fails, the `asyncResult.error` property will contain an error code.
